project.description: The name of the project to build. Can be an app or a library.

configuration.description:
A named build target, as specified in the "configurations" section of angular.json.
Each named target is accompanied by a configuration of option defaults for that target.

prod.description:
When true, sets the build configuration to the production target.
All builds make use of bundling and limited tree-shaking. A production build also runs limited dead code elimination.

help.description: Shows a help message for this command in the console.

dryRun.description: When true, runs through and reports activity without writing out results.

force.description: When true, forces overwriting of existing files.

interactive.description: When false, disables interactive input prompts.

defaults.description: When true, disables interactive input prompts for options with a default.
